name: Mac-Deck
description:
Mac-Deck is a card-battling game, set in 11th century Scotland,  where the battles are decided by playing a card game.

You can play as one of four Earls:

Macbeth The Brave

Duncan The Kind

Siward The Shadow

Brusi and Siggurdson The Twins

Each earl has it's own special effect and a special unit that can be played to gain an advantage during the duel.

Join the fight and see if you defeat the Earls of Scotland!

How to play:
  • The game is played by using the mouse only.
  • You can drag cards from your hand to the battlefield to play them.
  • You can only play 1 minion type card and 1 tactic type card per turn.
  • Some cards have effects, and require you to click on them.
  • To enter Battle Phase, you have to click the Battle button, and then click on card to select which card should be set to attack.
  • When you want to finish your turn, just press the End Turn button and see how does the AI react.
Thanks for playing the game, by the AcePixel team.
